name: Crazy Putter
description:
Not an ordinary golfgame! Skills & brain is needed to complete this action game!



-Use different balls to complete levels - helicopter balls, normal balls, bouncy balls and exploding balls!
-Use right ball in order, example if there is barriers, change exploding ball to use. (clicking other ball to use it)
-Control helicopter ball, hold finger on screen to add flying power!
-Many levels free to play and more to coming with patches!
-HD-graphics
- Achievements
